messages.subject: Steve Jobs Commencement Speech at Stanford (Connecting the dots)
messages.msgSnippet: I ve always been an Apple fan but this speech by Steve Jobs at Stanford University moved me to tears!  I hope you enjoy it too. -- Chris
messages.messageBody:
I've always been an Apple fan but this speech by Steve Jobs at Stanford University moved me to tears! I
hope you enjoy it too. -- Chris

http://news-service.stanford.edu/news/2005/june15/jobs-061505.html

Stanford Report, June 14, 2005
'You've got to find what you love,' Jobs says


This is the text of the Commencement address by Steve Jobs, CEO of Apple Computer and of Pixar
Animation Studios, delivered on June 12, 2005.

I am honored to be with you today at your commencement from one of the finest universities in the
world. I never graduated from college. Truth be told, this is the closest I've ever gotten to a college
graduation. Today I want to tell you three stories from my life. That's it. No big deal. Just three stories.

The first story is about connecting the dots...
